trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around October 7th 2008
Summary: 6 objects in total, the first heading over south mountain in a S/E direction, 4 in a slightly S/W direction, and 1 in a more sharp S/W direction.
divs: sighting detailson the way home from work i noticed a black spot comming over south mountain heading east while we were driving west on ray rd just on the east side of interstate 10. at first i thought it was a helecopter but realized that it had no rotor blade on the top. it was fairly low in the sky and slowly ascending. after watching it for about 10 seconds or so i told my fience to find somewhere to pull over the car so i could get out and take a better look. we pulled over in the mervyn's parking lot on the north side of ray rd. i thought maybe it was a really large bunch of red baloons as the object started to shine bright red and looked to be rotating vertically and it seemed to be lumpy like a bunch of baloons. when we got out of the car and took a closer look at it it seamed instead of reflecting matalic red like a foil baloon to be shining red lights the same red as stop light or brake lights on a car. then i noticed another identical object moving in a s\w direction looking like it had just flown over scottsdale\tempe. after that i noticed 2 more objects moving in a south direction looking like they had just flown over sky harbor airport. by this time the first one had begun rapidly ascendingand it seemed that the 5 objects were lined up diagonally the first the higher up and the second to last lowest. the last one seemed to speed up and fligh above the second to last. then we saw another identical object moving west from over the south end of mesa. the last object curved to head s\w and pulled in between the 2nd and 3rd object. all 6 of the objects continued to ascend untill we could no longer see them. it all took about 10 minutes. we didn't move after pulling into the mervyn's parking lot and after we could no longer see them we continued on to pick up our son from daycare. i noticed after picking my son up at daycare and we started heading to the taco bell on the n\w corner of chandler blvd and mountain pky. that there were no planes in the air. i watched the sky the whole way through the drive through and back to our apartment and saw only one plane and it was a private plane heading to chandler air park. i did not see another plane in the sky untill about 6:10 pm. my fience said while we were looking at the objects he noticed a comercial aircraft bank away from the objects but i didn't see it myself.
